reference: Bulow, J. 1979. "Analysis of pension funding under ERISA". NBER Working Paper no. H02. Kotlikoff, Laurence J. and Smith, Daniel. 1983. Pensions in the American Economy, Chicago University Press, Chicago, Illinois.
